moves.1. e4 c5 2. Nc3 Nc6 3. Nf3 e6 4. Bc4: Not the best line. White should have played d4 and Be3.
moves.5. O-O: crusial mistake. white should prefer a4.
moves.5... b5 6. Be2 Bb7 7. d4: now it is too late. d3 was better although black has the initiative and the better chances.
moves.7... cxd4 8. Nxd4 Qc7 9. Nxc6 dxc6 10. g: weakening the king side. fatal mistake
moves.11... b4 12. Nb1 Nxe4 13. a5: probably aiming for Be3 and Bb6 but it is too late.
moves.14... Qe5 15. Ra2 Rd8 16. Bd3 Qd5 17. Re: f3 was the last chance to stay alive but not for long i suppose
